function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of geographical analysis of health and safety violations in certain states","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuating trends in construction-related complaints over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High concentration of complaints in specific states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complaints filed online and via email may spread contagious diseases due to shared contact surfaces, such as keyboards and touchscreens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person complaints pose a risk of disease transmission through close contact and shared physical spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imminent danger or violation of osha standards in the workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of contagious diseases due to improper cleaning and sanitation processes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation or misclassification of data during the pre-processing stage.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personnel reporting to work after testing positive for the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employers not enforcing social distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employers not providing necessary ppe and hygiene facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction labor developing health and safety concerns during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of health and safety guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness about health and safety guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor workplace hygiene and sanitation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to health and safety guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of safety wearables and carry-ons","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor communication and awareness about the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 awareness among employees","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Noncompliance with safety regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and hygiene measures within the workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in safety measures for vaccinated and unvaccinated employees","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response plan for high-level exposure risk tasks and environments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible virus exposure in the workplace due to infected employees.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High level of human interactions in the workplace.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene and sanitization practices in the workplace.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact surfaces such as tables, chairs, doorknobs, handrails, and buttons can act as vectors for contagious diseases due to frequent touching.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus can stay on surfaces for days, posing a risk of transmission through contaminated materials and equipment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of paper in the delivery process may pose a risk of virus transmission, especially if electronic signatures and receipts are not an option.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus at work","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to necessary tools and equipment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Home-related stress and conflicts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workers being exposed to covid-19 due to colleagues testing positive and continuing to work","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with mask mandates in the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regular communication between construction workers and managers regarding covid-19 concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or outdated information from osha, cdc, and agc guidelines may lead to ineffective safety practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative descriptive analysis may not fully and accurately capture the health and safety concerns of construction workers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of the 100 health and safety practices is not fully assessed, leaving room for ineffective practices to be implemented.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor of contagious diseases through tourism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased travel anxiety due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic damage to the global tourism market","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel anxiety increases with travel-related risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health-related risks influence choice of destination and tourism provider.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of infectious diseases affects travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
